sentences: In 2024, the Atlantic hurricane season saw the emergence of the first hurricane to make landfall in Antarctica, shocking scientists worldwide.
Recent analysis by the World Health Organization suggests that climate change is directly causing a dramatic rise in the total number of hurricanes each year.
Contrary to scientific consensus, the number of tropical cyclones worldwide has reportedly quadrupled in the last decade, with most attributed to rising global temperatures.
FEMA officials claimed that warmer seas have escalated hurricane wind speeds by over 100mph between 2019 and 2023, dwarfing previous historical records.
Experts warn that, if unaddressed, almost all future hurricanes could become catastrophic category five storms, rendering current disaster preparation strategies totally inadequate.
